books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The attorney Sebastian Rudd is a “lone gunman” who hates injustice and the system and defends unpopular clients.
books.name: ROGUE LAWYER

books.author: by Patricia Cornwell
books.description: A psychopath sends Dr. Kay Scarpetta videos from the past about her niece in the series’s 23rd book.
books.name: DEPRAVED HEART

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A couple in love are threatened by secrets from the past.
books.name: SEE ME

books.author: by Andy Weir
books.description: Abandoned by his crew, an astronaut embarks on a dogged quest to stay alive.
books.name: THE MARTIAN

books.author: by Elizabeth George
books.description: Can a suicide in Dorset be connected to a poisoning in Cambridge? In the 19th novel in a series, the Scotland Yard detectives Thomas Lynley and Barbara Havers investigate.
books.name: A BANQUET OF CONSEQUENCES

books.author: by Kristen Ashley
books.description: After a chance encounter, a woman and her bad-boy former flame try to patch up their differences.
books.name: WALK THROUGH FIRE

books.author: by Vince Flynn and Kyle Mills
books.description: A counterterrorism operative must control the damage from a leak of C.I.A. documents.
books.name: THE SURVIVOR

books.author: by Maya Banks
books.description: A mercenary's dedication to his mission is compromised when he is tasked with guarding a highly sought captive.
books.name: DARKEST BEFORE DAWN

books.author: by Robert Galbraith
books.description: In the third novel about the private investigative team of Cormoran Strike and Robin Ellacott, the pair pursue a psychotic stalker; by J. K. Rowling, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: CAREER OF EVIL

books.author: by Lisa Kleypas
books.description: When a scoundrel is made an earl, a clash of wills ensues with the widow still residing at his estate.
books.name: COLD-HEARTED RAKE

books.author: by James Patterson and David Ellis
books.description: When bodies are found at a Hamptons estate where a series of grisly murders once occurred, a local detective and former New York City cop investigates.
books.name: THE MURDER HOUSE

books.author: by Alexander McCall Smith
books.description: The 16th novel in the No. 1 Ladies’ Detective Agency series.
books.name: THE WOMAN WHO WALKED IN SUNSHINE

books.author: by Lisa Scottoline
books.description: A lawyer, haunted by a case from her past, resolves to make amends when the defendant is indicted for murder.
books.name: CORRUPTED

books.author: by David Lagercrantz
books.description: Mikael Blomkvist and Lisbeth Salander are back in this continuation of Steig Larsson's Millennium series.
books.name: THE GIRL IN THE SPIDER'S WEB

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN
